old: あぁ、覚者様の幻が見える――
column2: Ah, the Lord of the Arisen's illusion can be seen-
speaker: Cool Pawn

old: 我が力、貴方のもとでも発揮したいものです
column2: I would like to demonstrate my power under you as well.
speaker: Cool Pawn

old: ああ――これこそ運命的な出会いというもの
column2: Ah, this is indeed what you would call a fateful encounter.
speaker: Cool Pawn

old:
貴方のもとで力が尽くせるのなら――！
それに勝る喜びはありません
column2:
If I can devote my strength under your leadership...!
There is no greater joy than that.
speaker: Cool Pawn

old:
この出会い――！
私と覚者様との絆を感じます
column2:
This encounter--!
I feel a bond between me and the Arisen.
speaker: Cool Pawn

old: ここは創造の刺激に満ちていますね
column2: This place is full of inspiration, isn't it?
speaker: Cool Pawn

old:
あぁ！　私の腕前、いつ披露させて
もらえるのでしょう
column2: Oh! When will I have the opportunity to demonstrate my skills?
speaker: Cool Pawn

old: 素晴らしい――物創りには最高の環境です
column2: Excellent--a great environment for creating things!
speaker: Cool Pawn

old: 完成品をお見せするのが楽しみです
column2: I look forward to showing you the finished product!
speaker: Cool Pawn

old: 急いては事を仕損じる、などと言いますよ
column2: We often say that hurrying will lead to mistakes.
speaker: Cool Pawn

old: ものを創ることが、これほど魅惑的とは
column2: Creating things can be so fascinating.
speaker: Cool Pawn

old:
反省します――
もっと、――もっと精進せねばっ！
column2:
I will reflect on this --
I need to be more -- more diligent!
speaker: Cool Pawn

old:
あぁ、何ということだ――
貴方に異界まで足を運ばせてしまうなど――！
この失点、必ずや取り返してご覧に入れます
column2:
Ah, what a turn of events...
To make you travel even to the other world...
I will definitely make up for this loss and show you.
speaker: Cool Pawn

old:
申し訳ありません
あのようなところで倒れてしまうとは
不覚でした――
column2:
I apologize.
I never expected to collapse in a place like that.
I am truly sorry.
speaker: Cool Pawn
